short_summary: the department of national defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  the delivery is requested at cfb halifax, nova scotia and cfb esquimalt, british columbia.
description: shower bath fixtures are required for use in military facilities, the delivery sites are requested on cfb halifax, nova scotia and cfb esquimalt, british columbia and for 20 pc of shower bath fixtures to be delivered to cfb halifax, nova scotia and for 20 all shower bath fixtures to be delivered to cfb esquimalt, british columbia.
full_summary:
# National Defence Canada Tender Announcement

**Title:** NSN 4510-21-9207289 - Shower Bath Fixture - A Provision by Request for Proposal

**Reference Number (RFP):** cb-6430-52273816
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number (IDIQ - W8482-241732/A):** W8482-241732/A

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** June 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 29, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (local time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2024

## Category of Demand
We are seeking bids under Trade Agreements 4510 - Faucets and Shower Heads.

## Description of Requirements

The Royal Canadian Navy is seeking a supplier to provide the following products:

* A shower bath fixture (Item 1) with NSN 4510-21-9207289, including 20 units - NSN21-9207019 (single quantity) at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* A shower bath fixture (Item 2) with NSN 4510-21-9207289, including 20 units - NSN21-9207019 (single quantity) at CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

## Contact Information

To obtain further information or documentations related to this tender, please contact:

Katharine Barker
E-mail: [katrina.barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:katrina.barker2@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 939-4337

**Important Information for Bidders:**

* Bidders are required to provide the brand name and model, or equivalent, NCAGE identification number, or equivalent of product that can be used in its place.
* All prices should be in Canadian dollars. Prices that are presented in any other currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate the terms of the contract with any successful bidders.

The successful bidder is expected to provide detailed documentation and certification for compliance with applicable regulations.

## Documents and Attachments

You can obtain this RFP document online at:

* English [link]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6430/rfp-w8482-241732-eng.pdf
* French [
